description: This file defines the WalletProvider class, which manages runtime state for wallet entries within a Flutter application. It wraps around a data repository (WalletRepository), provides APIs for loading, filtering, creating, updating, and deleting wallet entries, as well as computing totals like income, expenses, and balance. The class also notifies UI components of state changes.

classes.name: WalletProvider
classes.description: Manages runtime state for wallet entries, providing methods to load, filter, create, update, and delete entries, as well as computing totals and exposing data to UI components.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the provider and performs the first data load.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Reloads entries and totals with current filters.

methods.name: setDateRange
methods.description: Sets the date filter range and reloads data.

methods.name: setCategory
methods.description: Sets the category filter and reloads data.

methods.name: setType
methods.description: Sets the WalletType filter and reloads data.

methods.name: clearFilters
methods.description: Clears all filter criteria and reloads data.

methods.name: addEntry
methods.description: Creates a new wallet entry and returns the created entry.

methods.name: editEntry
methods.description: Updates an existing wallet entry and returns the updated entry.

methods.name: deleteEntry
methods.description: Deletes a wallet entry by ID.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves an entry by its ID from the current cache.

methods.name: categoriesInView
methods.description: Returns a list of unique categories in the current entries.
